abstract: Isilon‘s successful initial public offering could inspire other midrange data-storage companies to make a similar move, The 451 Group suggests in a report. The firm also predicts that other storage companies will get snapped up by acquirers such as Hewlett-Packard, Sun, or even longer shots such as Microsoft or fresh-out-of-bankruptcy SGI.
lead_paragraph: Isilon‘s successful initial public offering could inspire other midrange data-storage companies to make a similar move, The 451 Group suggests in a report. The firm also predicts that other storage companies will get snapped up by acquirers such as Hewlett-Packard, Sun, or even longer shots such as Microsoft or fresh-out-of-bankruptcy SGI.

headline.main: More Deals Likely in Storage Sector, Report Says
